com.acrosure

Class ProductManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrosure.ProductManager

  • public class ProductManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ProductManager handles all the product-related operations. This includes: get and list.

    • Method Summary

      Product get(java.lang.String productId)
      Get a product from the product ID

      Get a list of products
